channel.title: Getting Started on
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on

item.title: Pulling and Building DataTrails Docs
item.description: DataTrails Docs depend on npm version 14. If you do not have npm installed please use the following guide Ubuntu Cent OS/RHEL MacOS apt install npm yum install npm brew install npm To begin pull the latest DataTrails docs from Github git clone git@github.com:datatrails/datatrails-docs.git Move into the directory cd datatrails-docs Assure the npm version is at least 14 npm version Look for node: '14.21.3' or greater Either install npm version 14 or greater, or use a npm virtual environment such as nvm
